name: Tile Master 3D - Triple Match
description:
What makes Tile Master 3D different? If you like mahjong, puzzle, pictures match, match 3 game...this game is for your . The game contains massive challenging puzzles and well-designed levels. It is simple at the beginning, there will be more challenges as your skills improve. This game will give you a new experience, you need to use good logic and strategy to pass its level. Train brain, exercise logical thinking, increase memory.

- Tap any tiles, let it fly onto the board
- Three same tiles will be removed from the board. Clear all tiles as soon as possible.
- When all the tiles are cleared, this level is completed
- When there are 7 tiles on the board, you lose!

Features:
- 100% free games, props are also available in the game
- More than 999 challenging levels (continuously updated)
- Play anytime, anywhere, without WiFi.
- Have no time limit
- Thousands of layouts and useful tips, undo , and powerful boosters
- Variety of exquisite patterns, fruits, cakes, plants, animals, butterflies, pets
- Train your brain and fingers to bring you happy and fun time.
- Fight off boredom

Let's play this puzzle game with friends! Make easy and enjoy every day!!!
